text: Anthony Melchior Frank (born May 21, 1931)Marquis Who's Who on the Web was an American banker. He was the United States Postmaster General from 1988 to 1992 during the presidencies of Ronald Reagan and George H. W. Bush.Man in the News: Anthony M. Frank; Innovator for Postal Job - New York Times, February 3, 1988 He was born in Berlin. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1931 births Category:United States Postmasters General Category:People from Berlin
title: Anthony M. Frank
